content: crochet **fruit slice keychains** are quick and easy to make they are great to use up some scrap yarn and make a cute little gift plus they are a great project for the summer the pattern includes **step-by-step tutorials** on how to work in the round make an invisible join join new yarn to your project therefore it is great for beginner crocheters who are looking into trying new techniques **materials** 2 5 mm c usa 12 uk crochet hook sport weight 2 fine cotton yarn black embroidery floss one stitch marker to work in the round embroidery needle tapestry needle one metal split keyring with a short chain **yarn options** any yarn in your stash **size** each keychain measures 2 5 cm by 1 2 5 cm **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
